snippet: At least 35 people are dead and more than 160 are missing after a ferry carrying as many as 350 passengers capsized Monday on the swollen Brahmaputra River in eastern India during a severe storm.
abstract: Ferry capsizes in Brahmaputra River in eastern India, leaving at least 35 people dead and 160 missing.
lead_paragraph: At least 35 people are dead and more than 160 are missing after a ferry carrying as many as 350 passengers capsized Monday on the swollen Brahmaputra River in eastern India during a severe storm.
